Package se.liu.ida.paperio

Class Painter

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.liu.ida.paperio.Painter
  • class Painter
extends java.lang.Object
    A Painter is responsible for drawing the game area. Multiple painters can be used to draw the game area from different players views.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Board board  
      private int height  
      private Player humanPlayer  
      private java.util.List<Player> players  
      private int scale  
      private int width  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Painter​(int scale, Board board, Player humanPlayer, java.util.List<Player> players)
      Create a new painter with scale, board which state to be drawn, player to follow and all players

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Method is called from board to initialize a draw with graphics received
      private void drawGameArea​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws all tiles on the map with colors corresponding to owner and contested owner.
      private void drawPlayers​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws all players on the map with corresponding colors.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Painter

        Painter​(int scale,
        Board board,
        Player humanPlayer,
        java.util.List<Player> players)
        Create a new painter with scale, board which state to be drawn, player to follow and all players
        Parameters:
        scale - how much a tile should be scaled from one pixel
        board - board which state to be drawn
        humanPlayer - player to follow from which view the game area and player should be drawn
        players - all players that at each time should be drawn

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Method is called from board to initialize a draw with graphics received
        Parameters:
        g - graphics object used to draw

      • drawPlayers

        private void drawPlayers​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws all players on the map with corresponding colors. Doesn't draw players not seen by player.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object received as argument in paintComponent method

      • drawGameArea

        private void drawGameArea​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws all tiles on the map with colors corresponding to owner and contested owner. Doesn't draw tiles not seen by player.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object received as argument in paintComponent method
